text: Carl Adam Jörgen Düberg, born 9 July 1956 in Limhamn, Malmö, is a Swedish actor.Jörgen Düburg at Swedish Film Database He is the son of Axel Düberg, also an actor. Düberg graduated from the Swedish National Academy of Mime and Acting in Stockholm in 1980. He has been with the Helsingborg City Theatre's permanent ensemble since 1992. == Filmography == === Films === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !! Title !!
